com.VTC.langlib.parse

Interface ParseHandler


  • public interface ParseHandler
    ParseHandler interface, defining the structure of all langlib-based parsing. This class should provide the methods through which the language may be parsed and prepared for execution.
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<? extends Instruction> getProgramInstructions(java.lang.String filename)
      Given the passed file, parse the file into a list of instructions.

    • Method Detail

      • getProgramInstructions

        java.util.ArrayList<? extends Instruction> getProgramInstructions(java.lang.String filename)
        Given the passed file, parse the file into a list of instructions. Precondition: The file passed exists and is not null.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file which is assumed to contain the program instructions.
        Returns:
        instructions The instructions which should be run according to the target program written in this langlib-based language.
